Blazewater Bay06962iib40zvi0rt8oy9ce1xbff0mxu260sa1207932014-03-29T02:11:53ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:Blazewater Bay.png|right|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of Blazewater Bay off the coast of Westeros.]]
'''Blazewater Bay''' is a region off the north-western coast of the continent of [[Westeros]]. It is part of the [[Sunset Sea]]. The bay is located between [[Cape Kraken]] and the south coast of [[the Rills]]. [[Flint's Finger]] is located on the southern edge of the bay.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/moat-cailin/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Moat Cailin entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Blazewater Bay forms the mouth of the Saltspear, a long, narrow bay between the [[Barrowlands]] and [[the Neck]], which in turn is fed by the Fever River.
